DataSource.Query: SELECT inventory.stores.store_name, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, inventory.checkout_details.price, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * inventory.checkout_details.quantity AS quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * ROUND(inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity, 4) AS amount, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * inventory.checkout_details.shipping_charge AS shipping_charge, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * inventory.checkout_details.discount AS discount, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) - inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS sub_total, CASE WHEN inventory.checkout_details.transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN -1 ELSE 1 END * ROUND((inventory.checkout_details.price * inventory.checkout_details.quantity) - inventory.checkout_details.discount, 4) AS total FROM inventory.checkout_details INNER JOIN inventory.stores ON inventory.stores.store_id = inventory.checkout_details.store_id INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.checkout_details.item_id = inventory.items.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON inventory.checkout_details.unit_id = inventory.units.unit_id WHERE checkout_id IN ( SELECT inventory.checkouts.checkout_id FROM inventory.checkouts INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.book = 'Purchase Return' AND inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id=@transaction_master_id ) ORDER BY checkout_detail_id;
